parse.title: List of Japanese manga magazines by circulation

text.*:
The following is a list of Japanese manga magazines by circulation, during the timespan of April 1 to June 30, 2018. These figures have been collected by the Japanese Magazine Publishers Association, which updates every three months. The updates are given long after the month's they reflect have passed due to the amount of information it takes to compile.

Contents

  • 1 Periodical circulation
  • 2 Total circulation
  • 3 See also
  • 4 Notes
  • 5 References

Total circulation[edit]

Rank Name Japanese name Total circulation/sales (millions) Demographic Founded Publisher
1 Weekly Shōnen Jump 週刊少年ジャンプ 7,500[6][A] Shōnen 1968 Shueisha
2 Weekly Shōnen Magazine 週刊少年マガジン 5,237[B] Shōnen 1959 Kodansha
3 Weekly Shōnen Sunday 週刊少年サンデー 1,877[C] Shōnen 1959 Shogakukan
4 Ribon りぼん 594[D] Shōjo 1955 Shueisha
5 Nakayoshi なかよし 414[E] Shōjo 1955 Kodansha
6 CoroCoro Comic コロコロコミック 407[F] Kodomo/Shōnen 1977 Shogakukan
7 V Jump Vジャンプ 350[G] Shōnen 1993 Shueisha
